h2_title: Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms
content:
Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms



Once you reach Chapter 3, you can revisit the Monkey at his cave in the Marsh of the White Mist and purchase more Awaken Wine Worms from him.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md", within the section "Awaken Wine Worm Locations" and the sub-section "Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms". The content is presented below:

Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms



Once you reach Chapter 3, you can revisit the Monkey at his cave in the Marsh of the White Mist and purchase more Awaken Wine Worms from him.
